<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Search parts"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/parts/search"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Searches parts with flexible keyword and field-based search options. Supports custom filtering via the `SupportsCustomFilters` attribute.

**Search Options**:
- `Query` - Keyword search term
- `SearchPartName` - Search in part names
- `SearchPartNumber` - Search in part numbers
- `SearchPartLocation` - Search in part locations
- `SearchPartCategory` - Search in part categories
- `UniqueByName` - Return unique results by name

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Search criteria for parts.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request parameters for searching parts.","properties":{"Query":{"type":"string","description":"Keyword search term."},"UniqueByName":{"type":"boolean","description":"If true, return only unique results by part name."},"SkipCustomFieldLoading":{"type":"boolean","description":"If true, skip loading custom field data for performance."},"SearchPartName":{"type":"boolean","description":"Include part names in the search."},"SearchPartNumber":{"type":"boolean","description":"Include part numbers in the search."},"SearchPartLocation":{"type":"boolean","description":"Include part locations in the search."},"SearchPartCategory":{"type":"boolean","description":"Include part categories in the search."}},"title":"SearchPartsRequest"},"example":{"Query":"keyboard","SearchPartName":true,"SearchPartNumber":true,"UniqueByName":false}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
